115333212.content:
"Bye!" Penny chirped as Mr. and Mrs. Eriksson walked off.

Penny had just come to their apartment to babysit their son, Jack.

Jack was 13 years old. Penny felt, at least, that he was old enough to be by himself. But overprotective parents and all that.

Anyway, Penny was unfortunately strapped for cash at the moment, and didn't really care how old he was, or what his interests were, what kind of kid he was, and so on. Money was money.

She and Jack sat awkwardly for an hour or so. The two sort of avoiding one another for a time. Penny took to just watching TV instead.

As she was watching the early night talk shows, the ones that come on around seven that nearly nobody watches, a hypnotist came on.

"Hm. Hypnosis huh? Wonder what the guys would think about this. Bet Sheldon thinks it's all B.S." she quipped to herself.

Suddenly a woman from the crowd was brought on stage to be hypnotized.

"Alright. Just watch the watch sway. Watch it go back and forth. Back and forth" he said to her. Penny, however, was also watching.

"See it as it sways there. Notice as the rest of the world fades from view. The watch your only focus."

Penny's view darkened. The room around her seemed to fade. She was only watching the watch.

"All outside distractions fade. Only listening for a voice. A voice to latch on to. To command you." he said.

"Excuse me? Penny?" Jack said from down the hall. It seemed he needed something but instead... that was the voice Penny latched on to.

The man on TV began giving the woman commands, but Penny didn't follow. She was waiting for the voice she latched to in order to give her commands.

Jack approached, seeing her glassy eyed, looking at the TV

"Uh... excuse me?" he said. Penny didn't move. Just staring ahead. "I uh... I'm hungry. Could you... make me a sandwich or..?" he muttered. He wasn't expecting anything. But Penny didn't reply. She just stood and went to the kitchen, starting on his sandwich.

Confused, Jack looked at the TV.

"A hypnotist?" he said to himself. It then hit him.

His hot, blonde babysitter was under a trance... meaning... maybe Jack could have some fun tonight after all.

Penny returned with a sandwich on a plate and sat it on the coffee table before him. She just stood there, rigid and blank as he took a bite and looked her over. He smiled mischievously, thinking of what he could do to mess with her.

How does he begin?

And now Goku thinks he can only tell the difference between boys and girls by patting them in the private area. There's got to be something I can do, Goku's driving me insane!"

Bulma then sighed deciding they’re wasn’t anything she could do to stop the antics of Goku right now, deciding that she might as well follow in his footsteps and go to sleep.

As Bulma got into bed, and started drifting to sleep. The last thing she thought was ‘if they’re only some way to control Goku’. And as Bulma dosed of l, she began to dream.

Of course Bulma knew what dream this was, she was wearing her luxurious pink ball gown and looking absolutely stunning. And there waiting only steps away from her, was her Prince Charming, she could never get a good look at his face but he was muscular and dressed well, and this was about to be her favourite part of the dream, when she walks up to her beautiful Prince Charming and gets to Kiss him.

Only for Goku to come out of nowhere and kick her fantasy lover into the sky.

“GOKU!?! How could you do that he was my true love you jerk!” Screamed Bulma in a insane rage, while the dream version of Goku could only laugh in her face.

“Sorry Bulma but he looked so strong i thought he’d be able to fight me” tried to explain the young boy, only for Bulma to not be interested in a Single word of the dumb kids explanation.

“Grrrrr if they’re was only some way I could control you’re dumb little ass!” Shouted Bulma tears welling up in her eyes at how she can never escape his stupidity and strength.

However, their just as Bulma had given up all hope, suddenly as if from out of nowhere her mother appeared as if from out of nowhere, wearing a puffy baby blue ball gown and having butterfly wings stick out of her back as she majestically flew down to Bulma.

“Mom!?! What are you doing in my dream and what are you wearing?” Questioned Bulma confused by what she saw before her.

However Bulmas mother only snickered at her confusion and explained. “No child I’m not you’re mother I’m your fairy godmother and I’m here to help you get you’re happy ending, by taking care of pests like him”. Said Bulmas mother staring at Goku, who was busy peeing on the street.

Bulmas fairy godmother then began to use the wand in her hand to transform goku.

Goku was left mortified as his body changed from that of a martial arts boy with a monkey tail, but into a fairy tail princess with pigtails.

When Bulma saw the work done by her mother she was left in shock. Goku has been changed into the perfect little girl by her mother.

Bulmas mother then snickered. “And now it’s your turn to control him sweetie, and help that little boy find his happy ending.” Explained Bulmas mother as she handed Bulma the wand.

It was then Bulma came up with a ingenious plan to make Goku do what she wants, waking up with a devious smile on her face.

“I got it! I’ll create an invention to make Goku submit and become my adorable little sister”.

Bulma then began to work on the device with a few of the supplies she brought with her from Capsule Corp and a hour later the device was complete. A wand shaped device that could change anything about people from clothing, to hairstyle, to posture, and even voice.

“With this wand I can be Gokus fairy god sister and make him into my adorable little sister, that way he can never embarrass me again!” Said Bulma to herself as she knew Goku was about to get up soon and debated what to change about him first?

14131221.content:
Things were looking pretty good for the world.

Zamasu and Goku Black had been vanquished, the Gods seemed satisfied for now, so no more tournaments were being held, and of course, summer had arrived!

And with this, Bulma Briefs, blue-haired owner of Capsule Corp, decided to have a bit of a party for her and her friends. And by "party", she actually meant a night on the town.

After her, Chi-Chi, Videl, and 18 went to dinner and did a bit of shopping, they had one final stop.

Around nine PM the girls headed into Mr. Satan's Spectacular Theatre.

A rather hilarious notion to Videl, since her father wasn't a fan of theatre. But he was a fan of money.

The girls entered and took their seats, all but Bulma knowing what the show was... But none knowing what awaited them.

The music queued up; a rather fantastic and enchanting number playing as a voice came over the speakers.

"Lllllladies and gentlemen! Thank you for coming tonight! We have a very special treat for you this fine evening. She's been charming audiences all over the country, and now she's here to enthrall and captivate you! Please give it up for the amazing Mesmerella!"

A woman dressed in a rather sexy looking suit jacket, corset, and skirt came strutting out. Her ensamble completed by a black top hat resting on her head.

"Hello everyone!" She said with a sweet smile "I am Mesmerella! Magician extraoridnaire! And boy do I have a show for you tonight! But before we begin... I'm going to need some volunteers! How about..."

The spotlight from the stage began to dance around the crowd, before settling on the four ladies

"You four!" She boomed.

18 shifted uncomfortably in her seat. Bulma and Chi-Chi exchanged a worried glance, and Videl's face turned a bright pink as she blushed

"Don't be shy! Come on up!" Mesmerella entreated.

The girls, pressured by the crowd, slowly stood and made their way to the stage.

Once there, Mesmerella pulled out a pocket watch

"Now, ladies and gentlemen! We begin this show with a classic act! Hypnosis!" She boomed, as she began swinging the watch...

But who does she hypnotize?

It was a pretty normal day in the Hidden Leaf village. Especially for Tsunade.

The busty Hokage made her way into work as usual, sat at her desk and handled her business. Disputes between villagers, paperwork, setting up some training regiments for the Ninja. Nothing overly spectacular... That is, until Shizune showed up with a letter.

"Lady Tsunade!" She exclaimed, rushing in and bowing.

"What is it, Shizune?"

"I have a letter for you. Its marked as urgent." She replied, setting the letter on the desk.

Tsunade looked it over... The address seemed familiar to her somehow but she just couldn't place where it was. She sat back in her chair

"Hm... Well, thanks Shizune" she huffed. And with that, Shizune left.

Tsunade's waited a moment before opening the letter. And what she found inside... Well... Wasn't what she wanted.

"Lady Tsunade

I hope you didn't expect me to just forget your debts to me. You've racked up quite the tab at my bar. And don't even think I forgot about the exorbitant amount of gambling debts you owe, too.

I know you can't pay me back in money. Even the Hokage doesn't have that kind of money. So I have a solution. Come to the Casino tonight.

Yours truly,
Butch"

Tsunade slammed her hands down in frustration.

She knew she owed a lot. But she owed the most to Butch, the head of the Monkey's Paw Casino. And honestly, she knew that Butch was willing to drag her name through the mud if she didn't comply with this.

That night, after leaving work, she headed to the casino and was immediately escorted to Butch's office.

The two sat in silence for a while; Tsunade with her arms crossed and a scowl on her face. Butch with a smug grin.

"Well?" Tsunade's snapped "You said you want me to pay me debts right? And I can't afford them. So what exactly do you plan to accomplish here?"

"That's right. You'll be a waitress and entertainer. Every night you come in here, get dressed in our nice, sexy waitress staff outfits, and go around and serve the customers. They want anything else, though, and you do it. And, of course, on special nights where we have shows and performances, you'll participate. If you don't then... Well... I'll be forced to tell everyone about these debts of yours"

She knew he had left her with no real options. She'd lose everything if the whole village knew she was out here gambling and drinking all the time. It wasn't fitting of a Hokage.

Tsunade fidigeted in her chair, looking down at her feet.

"F-fine..." She muttered

It had been a bit of a stressful night for Yang, the busty blonde member of team RWBY.

She lay in bed in the RWBY dorm, tossing and turning. She needed some way to get to sleep... She just didn't know what.

She browsed the internet for a bit on her phone, looking for sleep remedies, when she eventually happened upon a hypnosis video.

She'd always heard that hypnosis could help people sleep and relax. She was skeptical, but at this point she was willing to try anything.

She relaxed back, letting the soothing music and dulcet tones of a man's voice lull her into slumber.

The busty blonde's eyes slowly closed as she was gently dragged down into sleep under the video's power. Little did she know, however, that this video wasn't what she thought.

It was the first in a playlist. A playlist intended for hypnosis fans who wanted to have a bit of fun. Not for sleep.

"When you hear the words 'Obey, my dear' you will drop back into a trance" the voice politely said. He was setting up future videos. Each would begin with that phrase so the person could be reprogrammed night after night.

"Each night when you go to bed, you will turn on one of the videos in this list. You will select it at random, of course. And you will follow the instructions it gives. Why don't you try it now? Slowly open your eyes and just pick one at random.

Yang's eyes fluttered open, as the entranced blonde's finger scrolled the list, randomly tapping one of the videos.

"Obey, my dear" the video said, and her eyes closed again.

Yang woke in the morning feeling refreshed and alert! She was ready to start her day.

1452131.content:
Yang absolutely hated shopping for jewelry. She never wore it herself. She found it kind of gaudy and flashy, and she preferred her flashiness to come from her combat, not shiny accessories.

However, Weiss's birthday was coming up. Ruby, Blake, and Yang had all pooled their money to get her something and Yang... ended up with the least money invested. So it was on her to buy.

They had picked out a really nice necklace from a store in downtown Vale. They had paid too. All Yang needed to do was go in and get it. But even so, she hated it.

Everyone else in the shop was dressed in some kind of fancy, posh attire. Men in suits, women in dresses, while Yang was wearing her signature tank top and leather jacket. All eyes turned to her. She knew she didn't fit in here.

Mustering whatever confidence she could, she started walking towards the center of the store, towards the clerk.

"Hm... can I... help you?" he sneered. Yang could tell he looked down on her.

She sighed, she just wanted to get this necklace and go home.

"Yeah. We reserved a necklace. The reservation should be 'Belladonna'." she said.

The clerk pulled out a record book and looked it over.

"Ah yes. You wanted the necklace from the Guardian's collection? A wonderful choice. It.. isn't for you, is it?" he huffed

"No. It's for a friend" she snarled.

The man nodded and walked off. Reemerging with a box.

"Gift wrapped and ready. Here you are" he said, handing it to her.

Yang nodded and turned to walk away. As she did, though, she collided with another man. Hard.

Both stumbled back, Yang hitting the display case behind her, and the man the case behind him.

The clerk rushed out to check on the man.

"Sir! Are you alright?!" he exclaimed.

"Uuuhhg... I'm fine, by the way" Yang grumbled, sassily.

The clerk helped the man to his feet, and Yang stood. But she noticed... damage was done. Not to her. And not to the man. Their auras saw to that. But the glass display cases were busted, and... some of the jewelry was cracked, snapped, and crushed.

In no time, the police had shown up. Yang was sitting in the corner, waiting. Eventually the clerk and an officer approached her.

"Ma'am. I hear this was your fault?" he said

"Look, I just turned around and bumped into the guy! It's not like I did it on purpose!" she protested

"You... still did a lot of damage here. Accident or not, you'll have to pay for it."

Yang gritted her teeth. She clung to a false hope that MAYBE it wouldn't be too much.

"How much..?" she sighed

"50,000 lien. Give or take" the clerk said.

Yang's heart sank, and a lump formed in her throat. She couldn't pay that! She scrounged everything she had for Weiss's gift, after all.

"I... I can't... uh..." she muttered

"In that case, it looks like we'll have to take you to the station for a destruction of property charge" the officer sighed.

He and Yang stood, and began walking off. But the clerk's face twisted into a sly grin.

"Hold a moment, officer. I may have a way for this girl to pay us back" he said

"How? She doesn't have the money."

"She doesn't need it. If she agrees to advertise for us." he said

"A-advertise?" Yang said, her face growing red

"That's right. A pretty young thing like you pushing our products is sure to drive up sales. You make up for your destruction with that, and you're free." he shrugged

It seemed like a good deal. Better than going to jail and getting sued.

"I... fine" she agreed.

Yang returned the next day, ready for her first day of advertising...

But what would that entail?

15333222212211111.content:
One day, Angelica Pickles was spending the day at Tommy's house because both her parents had to work. Angelica hated babies, most especially her one-year-old cousin, Tommy, but she loved tormenting them. On this particular day, Angelica decided to play a trick on Tommy.

"Oh, Tommy!" Angelica said in a cheerful tone.

"What is it, Angelica?" Asked Tommy.

"My Mommy's going to have a new baby." Angelica told Tommy. This, of course, wasn't true, but Tommy didn't know this.

"Wow! Congratulations, Angelica! You're gonna be a big sister!" said Tommy.

"And I want to be a good big sister, too, so I want to practice changing diapers on you." Angelica told Tommy.

"But Angelica, my Mommy just changed my diapie. Asides, I don't have to go potty right now, so my diapie is clean." Tommy told Angelica.

"Well, we could just pretend your diaper is dirty or wet, I could take it off you, and then pretend it's clean again so I can put it back on." said Angelica.

"Okay, Angelica. Just so long as you put my diapie back on me, I'll play along." said Tommy.

"Great! Now lay down." said Angelica. Tommy lay down and pulled up his shirt. Angelica untaped his diaper, which was still clean, but she pretended it was dirty.

"Ewww, Tommy! Your diaper's real dirty! I'm gonna have to throw this one away! But don't worry, I'll be right back with a clean one!" Angelica said as she slipped it off. She left, taking Tommy's diaper with her. Once she got to the top of the stairs, she laughed wickedly.

"I can't believe that dumb baby fell for it! I'm not going to give him his diaper back at all!" said Angelica. Meanwhile, at the playpen, Tommy continued to lay down diaperless.

"Uh, Angelica? You can put my diapie back on now." Tommy said to Angelica, but there was no reply.

One day, Mike was walking through the park, when he saw Butch holding Orville, Alice's favorite teddy bear, out of the reach of Alice, Ryan, and Brad.

"Hey, Butch! That's my teddy bear!" Alice told Butch.

"Well, too bad. It's mine now!" Butch snarled, and he laughed wickedly.

"Hey, leave my friends alone!" Mike said as he ran up to Butch.

"Well, well, if it ain't Skinny." Butch said as he turned to Mike.

"I'm ashamed of you, Butch. I bet you couldn't be nice to Ryan and his friends, even for one day!" Mike told Butch.

"I can, too!" snarled Butch.

"Ha! If you were nice to them for just one day, I'd dress up like a baby!" Mike told Butch.

"I'd like to see that! You got yourself a deal, Skinny!" said Butch.

"Not so fast! If you lose, then you have to dress up like a baby." Mike told Butch. Butch probably shouldn't have taken Mike's bet, but he couldn't resist the idea of Mike dressing up like a baby, and he also knew that he would never let Mike live it down.

"I said 'You got yourself a deal, Skinny!'" Butch told Mike.

"Good. Then the bet starts now." said Mike. Butch turned to Ryan, Brad, and Alice.

"Gee, Alice. I'm sorry I took your teddy bear. Here, you can have it back." Butch said as he handed Alice her teddy bear.

"Uh, thanks, Butch." said a confused Alice. Ryan, Brad, and Alice were surprised. It wasn't like Butch to give back the things he took.

"Are you feeling okay, Butch?" Ryan asked Butch.
